commit message: Removed the unused background member variable
Removed the unused background member variable
Further refactoring to reduce visibility and refine public API. Removed classes and interfaces that provided too much flexibility at the expense of boilerplate
Methods and classes used only within the Actor package have been made package-protected
Further reductions in scope and removed erroneously committed diagrams
Moved Levels-related activities to the levels package
Removed pausables from Game as they are no longer needed now timing is centrally controlled
Actor now knows what to do when its hit without listeners
Hidden methods that dont need to be public
Refactored user input to be simpler (though less flexible) and refactored GameBuilder and GameBuilderDirector to be simpler
Removed unnecessary protected modifier from many methods
Removed unnecessary protected modifier from many methods
Added ads, resolved OOM errors by finishing activities and changed text colour
